data.name: Root Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Tap your toes/paws/claws to the bluegrass woodland jams of the official soundtrack to the hit digital board game Root! Composed by Michael Jason Corder.

  • Track 1: Once Upon a Tail
  • Track 2: Vagabond Blues
  • Track 3: A Theme of Woodland Might and Right
  • Track 4: Rumble in the Brush
  • Track 5: Fur Glory!
data.about_the_game:
Tap your toes/paws/claws to the bluegrass woodland jams of the official soundtrack to the hit digital board game Root! Composed by Michael Jason Corder.

  • Track 1: Once Upon a Tail

  • Track 4: Rumble in the Brush

data.short_description: Bring the wild woodland to life with the ferociously catchy soundtrack to the digital board game Root!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 41 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 166 MB available space
